data.introduce: 该接口对应黑屏指令是NFN,与国内净价查询接口搭配使用，所需的查询条件来源于国内净价查询接口返回的结果，用于查询指定运价的适用条件
data.business: 该接口对应黑屏指令是NFN,与国内净价查询接口搭配使用，所需的查询条件来源于国内净价查询接口返回的结果，用于查询指定运价的适用条件
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"ruleDisplay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则查询接口","children":[{"name":"domesticRuleDisplay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内规则查询","children":[{"name":"request","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求","children":[{"name":"travelAgencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office号","children":[]},{"name":"carrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码","children":[]},{"name":"pos","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"来自前序接口(NFD/PAT)返回的运价所对应的location","children":[]},{"name":"saleTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"销售时间（从前序接口获取，与rule中的生效、失效时间匹配）","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期（YYYY-MM-DD）","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻（hh:mm:ss）","children":[]}]},{"name":"ruleID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则ID","children":[]},{"name":"languageCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"languageCode：CN代表中文","children":[]},{"name":"otherInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"其他信息","children":[{"name":"etermCommand","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"eterm请求原始指令：（来自黑屏）【仅黑屏指令转换时系统自动填写，其他接口用户无需填写】","children":[]},{"name":"userData","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"仅ffep内部使用","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则查询接口","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息描述或内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]},{"name":"domesticRuleDisplay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内规则查询","children":[{"name":"response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果","children":[{"name":"carrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码（回显）","children":[]},{"name":"ruleID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则ID（回显）","children":[]},{"name":"pos","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"营业部（回显）","children":[]},{"name":"saleTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"销售时间（回显）","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻","children":[]}]},{"name":"rules","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则集合","children":[{"name":"rule","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"规则信息","children":[{"name":"catNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则category类型","children":[]},{"name":"catDetailsText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则内容文本","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"systemInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信息","children":[{"name":"systemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信息","children":[{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信息类型，ERROR-错误，WARNING-警告","children":[]},{"name":"code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信息代码","children":[]},{"name":"text","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"描述","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"otherInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"其他信息","children":[{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻","children":[{"name":"elapseTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"耗时","children":[]},{"name":"unit","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时间单位","children":[]}]},{"name":"requestTimeStamp","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"调用时间戳（文本格式）","children":[{"name":"requestTimeStampTest","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"调用时间戳（文本格式）","children":[]},{"name":"requestTimeStamp","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"调用时间戳（格式化）","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时刻","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"versions","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"版本信息","children":[{"name":"engineVersion","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码版本","children":[]},{"name":"codeVersion","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码版本","children":[]},{"name":"dbVersion","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数据版本","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息描述或内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="GBK"?>
<ruleDisplay>
    <domesticRuleDisplay>
        <response>
            <carrier>CA</carrier>
            <ruleID>IDD6C06008/22</ruleID>
            <pos>BJS</pos>
            <saleTime>
                <date>2021-04-16</date>
                <time>11:05:00</time>
            </saleTime>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>OUTBOUND_INBOUND</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>适用于团队、散客销售</catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>TEXT</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>1.适用期限:2006年6月16日-8月24日以旅行开始日期为准
2.适用客票:CA本票/CA电子客票/BSP客票/BSP电子客票           
3.航班限制:桂林-北京限CA1226.
4.订座舱位:W 
5.签转,OPEN票,RQ票:不允许
6.客票填开:
1)签注栏:不得签转改期每次每段300CNY.
2)票面价:按照实收价格进行标注.
3)票价类别:W/IDD6C06-008
4)最长旅行期限:10天(客票中必须注明旅行有效期)
5)2段联程须订在同一个PNR,填开同一本客票,3段(含)
  以上的联程必须使用连续票号;必须按航程顺序打印
  客票.否则,各航段按Y舱票价补收差额部分.
6)必须使用自动出票指令输入FC,FN项,手工输入的票价
  为无效票价,各航段按Y舱票价补收差额部分</catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>PASSENGER</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>所有其他种类折扣:不允许</catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>BOOK</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>COMBINATION</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>GROUP</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>TICKET</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>REFUND</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>1.自愿退票:
 1)客票全部未使用:收取实收票价的30%退票费,余额
   退还旅客.
 2)客票已部分使用:按照实收价格扣除已使用航段的
   Y票价,如有余额退还旅客.
2.非自愿退票:
 1)客票全部未使用:按实收票面价退票.
 2)客票已部分使用:扣除已使用航段M舱票价后余额退
   还旅客,不收退票费.
3.未按客票顺序使用的航段,不办理退票手续.</catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>REISSUE</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>改期:
始发航段不得改期,其它航段在旅行有效期内可以改期,
每次每航段收改期费300元人民币.</catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>EXPAND</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
                <rule>
                    <catNo>OTHER</catNo>
                    <catDetailsText>
                    </catDetailsText>
                </rule>
            </rules>
            <otherInfo>
                <time>
                    <elapseTime>160</elapseTime>
                    <unit>ms</unit>
                </time>
                <requestTimeStamp>
                    <requestTimeStampText>2021/05/25 15:01:03</requestTimeStampText>
                    <requestTimeStamp>
                        <date>2021-05-25</date>
                        <time>15:01:03</time>
                    </requestTimeStamp>
                </requestTimeStamp>
                <versions>
                    <engineVersion>V2</engineVersion>
                    <codeVersion>v2021.05.07.01</codeVersion>
                    <dbVersion>v3.1.0</dbVersion>
                </versions>
            </otherInfo>
        </response>
    </domesticRuleDisplay>
</ruleDisplay>
